body.name: NEURIVA Plus Brain Supplement for Memory and Focus Clinically Tested Nootropics for Concentration for Mental Clarity, Cognitive Enhancement Vitamins B6, B12, Phosphatidylserine 30 Capsules

features: NOOTROPICS BRAIN SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT: Experience improved brain performance and unlock your full potential! Enhance your memory & focus with our clinically tested brain supplement. Formulated with coffee cherry Neurofactor, plant-sourced phosphatidylserine, and B vitamins for optimal brain health.

CLINICALLY TESTED NEUROFACTOR FORMULA: Increase vital neuroprotein BDNF levels with our Neurofactor from whole coffee fruit extract. BDNF plays a crucial role in facilitating connections between brain cells, promoting synaptogenesis, synaptic plasticity, and neuronal survival.
B VITAMINS: Essential for cognitive function, vitamins B6 & B12 help enhance brain energy production, neurotransmitter synthesis, and mood support, promoting overall brain well-being.

TRUSTWORTHY AND HIGH-QUALITY INGREDIENTS: We prioritize your well-being, which is why our brain health capsules are formulated with vegetarian, gluten-free, GMO-free, and decaffeinated ingredients. Rest assured that you're consuming a premium quality supplement.

JUST ONE CAPSULE A DAY: Adults aged 18 years and older should take one capsule daily at bedtime. This convenient serving contains all of the brain-supporting ingredients required to fuel your brain health.

PEACE OF MIND: Neuriva brain support supplements, like all Schiff products, are backed by our commitment for freshness, purity, and labeled potency. Trust in the quality of Neuriva supplements to support your brain health goals.

GET THE NEURIVA APP: Boost your brain fitness routine and assess your cognitive skills by downloading our NEURIVA BRAIN GYM app, available on the App Store or Google Play. Take advantage of our digital tools to track your longterm brain performance.
DISCLAIMER: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
body.description: Do More For You Brain with Neuriva Plus capsules, a nootropic brain support supplement. Designed with clincally tested Neurofactor plus phosphatidylserine, and B vitamins to fuel 6 indicators of brain health including memory, focus, and concentration. Clinically tested Neurofactor, derived from decaffeinated whole fruit coffee extract, increases vital BDNF levels and plays an important role in the survival, growth, and maintenance of brain cells, improving overall brain health. Combined with Phosphatidylserine to support memory and learning plus B vitamins to support cognitive function and reduce fatigue. Trustworthy and high-quality ingredients are our priority. Our brain health capsules are vegetarian, gluten-free, GMO-free, and decaffeinated. Take one capsule a day at daily for optimal results and to ensure your brain receives all of the benefits of our brilliant brain-supporting ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fountain of Youth for the Mind: Sharp, Energized, and Ever Focused
reviews.reviewText: As a lifelong learner and someone who values mental sharpness, I've spent quite a bit of time trying various brain health supplements. Of all the products I've tried, none have come close to the cognitive enhancement I've experienced when combining NEURIVA Plus Brain Supplement with Alpha Grind Longevity Nootropic Coffee. NEURIVA Plus is a well-crafted brain supplement that ticks all the boxes for cognitive support. With a unique blend of ingredients designed to support brain health, including plant-sourced Sharp PS and clinically studied Coffee Cherry Extract, it does a remarkable job at fostering focus, memory, learning, accuracy, and concentration. Since starting on NEURIVA Plus, I've felt an improvement in my mental clarity and information recall. Alpha Grind Longevity Nootropic Coffee is a real game changer. As a coffee enthusiast, I was initially intrigued by the idea of a cup of joe that could boost my brain function. Alpha Grind does exactly that and more. It's a delicious, high-quality coffee that gives me the caffeine kick I need to start my day, while the added nootropic elements help maintain my mental acuity throughout the day. Pairing these two together? It's like unlocking the fountain of youth for your mind. The combination of NEURIVA Plus and Alpha Grind seems to create a synergistic effect that amplifies the benefits of both products. My focus is sharper than ever, my memory is on point, and my cognitive endurance has significantly improved. Even during high-stress situations, I've noticed my ability to think clearly and make decisions has enhanced. While each product is effective on its own, their combined use has been a revelation. The NEURIVA Plus keeps my cognitive functions firing on all cylinders, and the Alpha Grind provides the energy and mental stamina to make the most of those functions. It's like a one-two punch for brain health and cognitive function. In summary, if you're looking to invigorate your mind and boost your cognitive functions, look no further. The combination of NEURIVA Plus Brain Supplement and Alpha Grind Longevity Nootropic Coffee is the mental fountain of youth you've been searching for. Sharp, focused, and always ready to tackle whatever comes your way. Remember to consult with your doctor before starting any new supplement routine. Your cognitive health is of utmost importance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I am so happy!
reviews.reviewText: I have to complement the person that delivers my package! I’ve put in writing I’ve called and requested because somethings have been taken from the back. But, I asked that my packages be delivered to the front and the deliver did it! Yahoo! Thank you! I have so much trouble getting packages from the steps off the back. I am handicapped and the delivers make it so hard leaving things in the back. I have to go down a few steps and get the packages up the few steps. Only four, but it is so painful! But this deliver was thoughtful and followed direction! Oh the package? It was a small one. And the product is good I talked to my pharmacist and was told that neuriva has more vitamins and herbs that were not just good for your brain and memory but good for your health! ! I can tell you that after two months. I am little sharper than before. I’m not saying the other bran is bad, people are different and it may work better for them but, neuriva plus works very well for me. Even my children notice! Thanks!!!
